import React from 'react' import '../style/App.css' const Faq = () => { return (

Frequently Asked Questions

Hey guys!

Lekan and Wendy are so excited to have you all on board here and so grateful that you decided to purchase some wedding items to make our lives easier.{' '}

We decided to make this website as user friendly as possible, but we understand if you have further questions or areas that need clarifications, and we are willing to help you out as much as possible.

Here are some frequently asked questions but you can also reach out to Wendy at chinwenduolalekan@gmail.com if you need additional information.{' '}

How long can I reserve an item?

You are allowed to reserve an item for a total of 5 hours. After which the item will be removed from your reservation list and can be purchased by someone else.

Can I purchase multiple items?

Yes, you are allowed to purchase multiple items from the registry list. You can also purchase items from the various categories available.

Can I purchase an Item that is not on the list on this website?

Unfortunately, you cannot purchase items that are not on the registry list on this website. If you do want to purchase something that is not on the registry list, contact Wendy at chinwenduukoha@gmail.com for more details.

What should I do if the item I want to purchase has already been bought by someone else?

We are sorry that you have found yourself in this situation. You can purchase another item on the registry list but if you do not find another item of your preference on the website, please refer to question 3.

Can I send cash as a wedding gift?

We will really appreciate it if you purchase an item from the registry. However if you prefer to send cash please contact chinwenduolalekan@gmail.com for additional payment info.

This is a model of my wedding website I built during my software engineering immersive program at General assembly. Check me out on Linkedin!

) } export default Faq
